35 #include "pilz_industrial_motion_planner/trajectory_blender_transition_window.h"
36 
37 #include <algorithm>
38 #include <memory>
39 #include <math.h>
40 #include <tf2_eigen/tf2_eigen.h>
41 #include <moveit/planning_interface/planning_interface.h>
42 
43 bool pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlenderTransitionWindow::blend(
44  const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& planning_scene,
45  const pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlendRequest& req,
46  pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlendResponse& res)
47 {
48  ROS_INFO("Start trajectory blending using transition window.");
49 
50  double sampling_time = 0.;
51  if (!validateRequest(req, sampling_time, res.error_code))
52  {
53  ROS_ERROR("Trajectory blend request is not valid.");
54  return false;
55  }
56 
57  // search for intersection points of the two trajectories with the blending
58  // sphere
59  // intersection points belongs to blend trajectory after blending
60  std::size_t first_intersection_index;
61  std::size_t second_intersection_index;
62  if (!searchIntersectionPoints(req, first_intersection_index, second_intersection_index))
63  {
64  ROS_ERROR("Blend radius to large.");
65  res.error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN;
66  return false;
67  }
68 
69  // Select blending period and adjust the start and end point of the blend
70  // phase
71  std::size_t blend_align_index;
72  determineTrajectoryAlignment(req, first_intersection_index, second_intersection_index, blend_align_index);
73 
74  // blend the trajectories in Cartesian space
75  pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CartesianTrajectory blend_trajectory_cartesian;
76  blendTrajectoryCartesian(req, first_intersection_index, second_intersection_index, blend_align_index, sampling_time,
77  blend_trajectory_cartesian);
78 
79  // generate the blending trajectory in joint space
80  std::map<std::string, double> initial_joint_position, initial_joint_velocity;
81  for (const std::string& joint_name :
82  req.first_trajectory->getFirstWayPointPtr()->getJointModelGroup(req.group_name)->getActiveJointModelNames())
83  {
84  initial_joint_position[joint_name] =
85  req.first_trajectory->getWayPoint(first_intersection_index - 1).getVariablePosition(joint_name);
86  initial_joint_velocity[joint_name] =
87  req.first_trajectory->getWayPoint(first_intersection_index - 1).getVariableVelocity(joint_name);
88  }
89  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory blend_joint_trajectory;
90  moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes error_code;
91 
92  if (!generateJointTrajectory(planning_scene, limits_.getJointLimitContainer(), blend_trajectory_cartesian,
93  req.group_name, req.link_name, initial_joint_position, initial_joint_velocity,
94  blend_joint_trajectory, error_code, true))
95  {
96  // LCOV_EXCL_START
97  ROS_INFO("Failed to generate joint trajectory for blending trajectory.");
98  res.error_code.val = error_code.val;
99  return false;
100  // LCOV_EXCL_STOP
101  }
102 
103  res.first_trajectory = std::make_shared<robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory>(req.first_trajectory->getRobotModel(),
104  req.first_trajectory->getGroup());
105  res.blend_trajectory = std::make_shared<robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory>(req.first_trajectory->getRobotModel(),
106  req.first_trajectory->getGroup());
107  res.second_trajectory = std::make_shared<robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory>(req.first_trajectory->getRobotModel(),
108  req.first_trajectory->getGroup());
109 
110  // set the three trajectories after blending in response
111  // erase the points [first_intersection_index, back()] from the first
112  // trajectory
113  for (size_t i = 0; i < first_intersection_index; ++i)
114  {
115  res.first_trajectory->insertWayPoint(i, req.first_trajectory->getWayPoint(i),
116  req.first_trajectory->getWayPointDurationFromPrevious(i));
117  }
118 
119  // append the blend trajectory
120  res.blend_trajectory->setRobotTrajectoryMsg(req.first_trajectory->getFirstWayPoint(), blend_joint_trajectory);
121  // copy the points [second_intersection_index, len] from the second trajectory
122  for (size_t i = second_intersection_index + 1; i < req.second_trajectory->getWayPointCount(); ++i)
123  {
124  res.second_trajectory->insertWayPoint(i - (second_intersection_index + 1), req.second_trajectory->getWayPoint(i),
125  req.second_trajectory->getWayPointDurationFromPrevious(i));
126  }
127 
128  // adjust the time from start
129  res.second_trajectory->setWayPointDurationFromPrevious(0, sampling_time);
130 
131  res.error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS;
132  return true;
133 }
134 
135 bool pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlenderTransitionWindow::validateRequest(
136  const pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlendRequest& req, double& sampling_time,
137  moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes& error_code) const
138 {
139  ROS_DEBUG("Validate the trajectory blend request.");
140 
141  // check planning group
142  if (!req.first_trajectory->getRobotModel()->hasJointModelGroup(req.group_name))
143  {
144  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Unknown planning group: " << req.group_name);
145  error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_GROUP_NAME;
146  return false;
147  }
148 
149  // check link exists
150  if (!req.first_trajectory->getRobotModel()->hasLinkModel(req.link_name) &&
151  !req.first_trajectory->getLastWayPoint().hasAttachedBody(req.link_name))
152  {
153  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Unknown link name: " << req.link_name);
154  error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_LINK_NAME;
155  return false;
156  }
157 
158  if (req.blend_radius <= 0)
159  {
160  ROS_ERROR("Blending radius must be positive");
161  error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN;
162  return false;
163  }
164 
165  // end position of the first trajectory and start position of second
166  // trajectory must be the same
167  if (!pilz_industrial_motion_planner::isRobotStateEqual(
168  req.first_trajectory->getLastWayPoint(), req.second_trajectory->getFirstWayPoint(), req.group_name, EPSILON))
169  {
170  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("During blending the last point of the preceding and the first point of the succeding trajectory");
171  error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN;
172  return false;
173  }
174 
175  // same uniform sampling time
176  if (!pilz_industrial_motion_planner::determineAndCheckSamplingTime(req.first_trajectory, req.second_trajectory,
177  EPSILON, sampling_time))
178  {
179  error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN;
180  return false;
181  }
182 
183  // end position of the first trajectory and start position of second
184  // trajectory must have zero
185  // velocities/accelerations
186  if (!pilz_industrial_motion_planner::isRobotStateStationary(req.first_trajectory->getLastWayPoint(), req.group_name,
187  EPSILON) ||
188  !pilz_industrial_motion_planner::isRobotStateStationary(req.second_trajectory->getFirstWayPoint(), req.group_name,
189  EPSILON))
190  {
191  ROS_ERROR("Intersection point of the blending trajectories has non-zero "
192  "velocities/accelerations.");
193  error_code.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN;
194  return false;
195  }
196 
197  return true;
198 }
199 
200 void pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlenderTransitionWindow::blendTrajectoryCartesian(
201  const pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlendRequest& req, const std::size_t first_interse_index,
202  const std::size_t second_interse_index, const std::size_t blend_align_index, double sampling_time,
203  pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CartesianTrajectory& trajectory) const
204 {
205  // other fields of the trajectory
206  trajectory.group_name = req.group_name;
207  trajectory.link_name = req.link_name;
208 
209  // Pose on first trajectory
210  Eigen::Isometry3d blend_sample_pose1 =
211  req.first_trajectory->getWayPoint(first_interse_index).getFrameTransform(req.link_name);
212 
213  // Pose on second trajectory
214  Eigen::Isometry3d blend_sample_pose2 =
215  req.second_trajectory->getWayPoint(second_interse_index).getFrameTransform(req.link_name);
216 
217  // blend the trajectory
218  double blend_sample_num = second_interse_index + blend_align_index - first_interse_index + 1;
219  pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CartesianTrajectoryPoint waypoint;
220  blend_sample_pose2 = req.second_trajectory->getFirstWayPoint().getFrameTransform(req.link_name);
221 
222  // Pose on blending trajectory
223  Eigen::Isometry3d blend_sample_pose;
224  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < blend_sample_num; ++i)
225  {
226  // if the first trajectory does not reach the last sample, update
227  if ((first_interse_index + i) < req.first_trajectory->getWayPointCount())
228  {
229  blend_sample_pose1 = req.first_trajectory->getWayPoint(first_interse_index + i).getFrameTransform(req.link_name);
230  }
231 
232  // if after the alignment, the second trajectory starts, update
233  if ((first_interse_index + i) > blend_align_index)
234  {
235  blend_sample_pose2 = req.second_trajectory->getWayPoint(first_interse_index + i - blend_align_index)
236  .getFrameTransform(req.link_name);
237  }
238 
239  double s = (i + 1) / blend_sample_num;
240  double alpha = 6 * std::pow(s, 5) - 15 * std::pow(s, 4) + 10 * std::pow(s, 3);
241 
242  // blend the translation
243  blend_sample_pose.translation() = blend_sample_pose1.translation() +
244  alpha * (blend_sample_pose2.translation() - blend_sample_pose1.translation());
245 
246  // blend the orientation
247  Eigen::Quaterniond start_quat(blend_sample_pose1.rotation());
248  Eigen::Quaterniond end_quat(blend_sample_pose2.rotation());
249  blend_sample_pose.linear() = start_quat.slerp(alpha, end_quat).toRotationMatrix();
250 
251  // push to the trajectory
252  waypoint.pose = tf2::toMsg(blend_sample_pose);
253  waypoint.time_from_start = ros::Duration((i + 1.0) * sampling_time);
254  trajectory.points.push_back(waypoint);
255  }
256 }
257 
258 bool pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlenderTransitionWindow::searchIntersectionPoints(
259  const pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlendRequest& req, std::size_t& first_interse_index,
260  std::size_t& second_interse_index) const
261 {
262  ROS_INFO("Search for start and end point of blending trajectory.");
263 
264  // compute the position of the center of the blend sphere
265  // (last point of the first trajectory, first point of the second trajectory)
266  Eigen::Isometry3d circ_pose = req.first_trajectory->getLastWayPoint().getFrameTransform(req.link_name);
267 
268  // Searh for intersection points according to distance
269  if (!linearSearchIntersectionPoint(req.link_name, circ_pose.translation(), req.blend_radius, req.first_trajectory,
270  true, first_interse_index))
271  {
272  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Intersection point of first trajectory not found.");
273  return false;
274  }
275  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Intersection point of first trajectory found, index: " << first_interse_index);
276 
277  if (!linearSearchIntersectionPoint(req.link_name, circ_pose.translation(), req.blend_radius, req.second_trajectory,
278  false, second_interse_index))
279  {
280  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Intersection point of second trajectory not found.");
281  return false;
282  }
283 
284  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Intersection point of second trajectory found, index: " << second_interse_index);
285  return true;
286 }
287 
288 void pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlenderTransitionWindow::determineTrajectoryAlignment(
289  const pilz_industrial_motion_planner::TrajectoryBlendRequest& req, std::size_t first_interse_index,
290  std::size_t second_interse_index, std::size_t& blend_align_index) const
291 {
292  size_t way_point_count_1 = req.first_trajectory->getWayPointCount() - first_interse_index;
293  size_t way_point_count_2 = second_interse_index + 1;
294 
295  if (way_point_count_1 > way_point_count_2)
296  {
297  blend_align_index = req.first_trajectory->getWayPointCount() - second_interse_index - 1;
298  }
299  else
300  {
301  blend_align_index = first_interse_index;
302  }
303 }
